law.text: When any person removes any volatile substance from the container in which it is delivered to him and repackages it into containers not used in the ordinary course of business for the purpose of packaging such volatile substances and for the purpose of sale, a rebuttable presumption will be created that he intends to sell such substances for purposes prohibited by KRS 217.900.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 138, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980.
